name: VR Basketball Shoot 3D
description:
VR Basketball Shoot 3D - Feel virtual reality of indoor basketball court. This game is especially designed and developed for fans of 2016 ACC Men's Basketball Tournament to enjoy virtually create 360 degree environment of 3D gaming via using special glasses.

With special sound effect you can play basketball games like reality sound. We have added Graphical effect that encourage you to feel high quality ball throwing effect which add more fun and make it very addictive.

With Virtual Reality you can able to create new relaxation experience like reality.

To play VR Basketball moves your VR headset to look up, down & round and you have to try throw ball in hoop.

Features :
★ 360 degree rotation.
★ VR supported Theme
★ Stunning 3D Graphics
★ Addictive infinite Game Play
★ Thrilling ride.
★ Play it anytime with you VR Devices.
★ Dynamic music won’t let you get bore.
★ Addictive game play.
★ Real basketball court based exciting environment.
★ Google VR powered stereoscopic rendering and head tracking for mobile VR.
★ Endless enjoyment and excitement.

Let's play this sports basketball game with your device to aim and try to beat your own record in the field. Don't forget to share your best score with your friends on social media.
